content.rendered:
2019 saw JB Commercial celebrating our 15th year in the commercial furniture and interiors sector. A lot has changed in the last decade-and-a-half, and we’re delighted to celebrate plenty of milestones along the way. Here’s a picture of what we’ve been doing together over the last 15 years!

 

The whole team at JB Commercial Group wish you all a very happy 2020! Thank you very much to our clients, colleagues and friends for your support over the last 15 years, and we’re very excited to reveal what’s in store for the next 15+ years!
